text: "I Can't Go for That (No Can Do)" is a 1981 song by American duo Hall & Oates. It was taken from their 10th studio album Private Eyes. It went to number 1 in the United States, number 2 in Canada, number 5 in New Zealand, number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Ireland and number 13 in Australia. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Hall & Oates songs Category:Pop songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: I Can't Go for That (No Can Do)
